de.mbrero.see.controllers.extractors

Class QuickUmlsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mbrero.see.controllers.extractors.AbstractExtractorController
      • de.mbrero.see.controllers.extractors.QuickUmlsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Extractor

    public class QuickUmlsController
extends AbstractExtractorController
    This class is for managing the QuickUMLS extractor. It will use the python adapter written for this testing software since
    QuickUMLS is a barebone extractor that returns the results a a list of python
    dictionary objects.
    Author:
    massimiliano.brero@studium.fernuni-hagen.de
